spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include GT subcore in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Logicore Interlaken integrated IP core solution is designed to be compliant with Interlaken Protocol Definition, Revision 1.2. Supports different Line rate from 3.125G to 25.78125G with lanes from 1 to 12. Supports AXI4-Lite, IBFC, OOBFC, Duplex, Simplex TX, Simplex RX.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: ENABLE_AXI_INTERFACE
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Include AXI4-Lite Control and Statistics Interface

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: INS_LOSS_NYQ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the insertion loss of the channel between the transmitter and receiver at the Nyquist frequency in dB

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RX_EQ_MODE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the equalization mode, or allow the core to select a mode. Refer to the product guide for guidelines on selecting between DFE and LPM modes.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: ADD_GT_CNRL_STS_PORTS
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Enable Additional GT Control/Status and DRP Ports
